html: Life is so complicated. When we think in absolutes we are stunned by the consequences. To deny nuance is to deny humanity, and humanity is incredibly fucking thorny. It’s painful to ask the questions but even more painful to pretend that we know the answers.
text: Life is so complicated. When we think in absolutes we are stunned by the consequences. To deny nuance is to deny humanity, and humanity is incredibly fucking thorny. It’s painful to ask the questions but even more painful to pretend that we know the answers.
